import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { db,addItem } from './Firebaseconfig'; export default function AddEmployee() { const [isDataEntered, setIsDataEntered] = useState(false); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullName: '', employeeId: '', gender: '', dateOfBirth: '', address:'', phoneNumber:'', emailAddress:"", maritalStatus: '', nationalIdNumber: '', passportInfo: '', emergencyContact: '', bankName: '', // New field - Bank Name bankAccountNumber: '', // New field - Bank Account Number accountType: '', // New field - Account Type bankBranch: '', // New field - Bank Branch ifscCode: '', // New field - IFSC Code swiftCode: '', // New field - SWIFT/BIC Code (for international transactions) bankAddress: '', // New field - Bank Address micrCode: '', // New field - MICR Code pt: '', // New field - Professional Tax (PT) pf: '', // New field - Provident Fund (PF) esi: '', // New field - Employee State Insurance (ESI) residencyStatus: '', employmentStartDate: '', employmentStatus: '', jobTitle: '', department: '', reportingManager: '', compensationDetails: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [name]: value })); // Check if all data is entered whenever the form data changes const allDataEntered = Object.values({ ...formData, [name]: value }).every( (value) => value.trim() !== '' ); setIsDataEntered(allDataEntered); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Check if all data is entered const allDataEntered = Object.values(formData).every(value => value.trim() !== ''); setIsDataEntered(allDataEntered); if (allDataEntered) { // Post data to Firestore addDoc(collection(db, 'employeeData'), formData) .then((docRef) => { console.log("Document written with ID: ", docRef.id); alert("data submitted.."); // Clear the form data handleReset(); }) .catch((error) => { alert("Error! kindly contact 9 840 841 840"); console.error("Error adding document: ", error); }); } }; const handleReset = () => { setFormData({ fullName: '', employeeId: '', gender: '', dateOfBirth: '', address: '', phoneNumber: '', emailAddress: '', maritalStatus: '', nationalIdNumber: '', passportInfo: '', emergencyContact: '', bankName: '', // New field - Bank Name bankAccountNumber: '', // New field - Bank Account Number accountType: '', // New field - Account Type bankBranch: '', // New field - Bank Branch ifscCode: '', // New field - IFSC Code swiftCode: '', // New field - SWIFT/BIC Code (for international transactions) bankAddress: '', // New field - Bank Address micrCode: '', // New field - MICR Code pt: '', // New field - Professional Tax (PT) pf: '', // New field - Provident Fund (PF) esi: '', // New field - Employee State Insurance (ESI) residencyStatus: '', employmentStartDate: '', employmentStatus: '', jobTitle: '', department: '', reportingManager: '', compensationDetails: '', }); setIsDataEntered(false); }; return (

); }
